Text: As long as I draw breath, I won't give in!
It's time we ended this...
We cannot allow ourselves to be stalled here!
So they would overwhelm us with sheer numbers...
It seems we've earned a moment's respite...
Then let us take this opportunity to cure the tempered!
I won't let you harm my sister!

Time for my next trick!
G-Savior Mark II, opening containment field!
Use the teleporter to move between decks!

Accessing Ruby Weapon data, deploying claws!
Milisandia, grant me your strength!

Accessing Emerald Weapon data, deploying beam units!
This is for you, Rex!

Accessing Sapphire Weapon data, opening chest armor!
I won't let you down, Ricon!

Accessing all Weapon data!
Now we fight together!
This was never going to be easy... Let's see what you make of this!
I have to keep fighting until my dream─our dream─has been realized!
The true face of the Diamond Weapon...
Stay sharp! It's far more agile than before!

The G-Savior cannot take much more of this!
Withdrawing for emergency repairs!

The Mark II is in need of repair!
Fall back!

Raising magitek field!
There's no escape!

At this rate, it'll overheat...
Restoring armor!
Don't worry, Allie. I'll keep you safe!

G-Savior, returning to battle!
Opening containment field!
Removing the armor increases its speed, but it can't maintain that level of output. Now is our chance!

Sorry to keep you waiting!
The repairs to the Mark II should keep it airborne for now!

So, it can enhance its agility, but only for a short while...
We'd best pin it down while we still can!
Purging armor! Diamond Weapon, show them what you're made of!
Today, we fight as one!
This is the strength we gave our lives to obtain... The flame of hope will burn forever!

Wait, that's not Allie!
No, it cannot be...
Our dream will not─cannot─end here...
Arrive at A-4 Command
Clear A-4 Command
Arrive at A-4 Conquest
Clear A-4 Conquest
Arrive at A-4 Headquarters
Defeat Stigma-4
Intruder detected. Analyzing potential for knowledge acquisition... Affirmative.
Additional data desired. Transferring Omega unit to present coordinates.
Recalibrating threat levels... Deploying draconic specimen.
Analyzing combat data... Fascinating. Deploying new rocket-propelled armaments.
Capabilities exceed expected values. Initializing transformation sequence.
Neural structure of hostile life-forms analyzed. Stand by for interruption to combat functions.

まさか……敗北……
敗北したと……戦略に致命的な誤りがあったと……！？
Projection into simulated memory confirmed. You now witness the final war between our kind.
With the Alphatron Star's resources depleted beyond hope of sustainability, we were on the brink of destruction.
As part of the faction favoring subjugation of other stars, it created units for the upcoming invasion.
\\<whirr> Stigma-4 detected! Eliminate the unit guarding it and destroy its core!
Stigma-4 has initiated evasive action. Establishing connection with next memory region...
This memory region reflects our people's first encounter with another star─the subjugation of Gordhona.
Configuring data stream... Neural pathway connected.
The Lambda unit before you was produced in Gordhona with local materials, as became our standard operating protocol.
Stigma-4 has retreated into the next memory region. This unit requests you pursue with all haste.
As this unit projected, this memory is of our conflict on the Dragonstar.
\\<whirr> The dragons' assault has created a breach in the barrier. Infiltrate the facility!
\\<whirr> Access to Stigma-4's perceived “self” confirmed! Destroy this core to overwrite its expectation of victory.
Alert: Your presence has been detected. Sentinel units approaching current coordinates!
Those who would claim the resources of other stars clashed with those who believed that Alphatron might yet be saved.
At this time, Stigma-4─then known as “Alpha-4”─was positioned in the weapons manufacturing facility ahead.
Now approaching command sector. Accessing administrative memory to disable security system...
Our objective was to obtain the rich mineral resources of the Gordhonite asteroid belt─by any means necessary.
The Gordhonites boasted considerably advanced technology, but their machines proved inferior to the invading force.
The dragons were our strongest enemy, and it was through their capture and study that Stigma-4 learned the principles of adaptive evolution.
These principles were used to design the systems of the Omega model─first deployed in an unfinished state.
Arrive at Ingenuity's Ingress
Clear Ingenuity's Ingress
Arrive at Prosperity's Promise
Clear Prosperity's Promise
Arrive at Wisdom's Ward
Defeat the Magus Sisters
A foul place, this. Let us proceed with caution.
They seek to bar our path. The only way is through!

Oh gods, poor Nidhana!
We'll free you from this place, I promise!

I sense a great surge of aether, as if...
A summoning hath begun!

Look! Those beastly masks!
It's the Manusya, come to life!
We will focus on sustaining the Arkasodara!
The rest of you must keep going! Onwards and upwards!
Begone from our tower...
Begone...or become prey for the Magus!
Behold our ingenious magicks!
Dance! Dance until death claims you!
So, you have chosen defiance...
The tower must be protected...
We will not let it fall!
You will not steal away our prosperity!
We hear it! We heed it! The call to defend the tower!
If I alone cannot expel you...
You persist in your desecration?
Then face the full wrath of the Magus!
Join with me, Sisters!
Insatiable flame, consume our foe!
Glacial ice, entomb our foe!
Thunderous tempest, smite our foe!
While my blessings endure, then so shall we...
The end has come...and it will be beautiful!
Soon, my hold over Zodiark shall be complete...
Mine...all mine!
Ahahahahahaha!
The instrument of salvation...
...tolling the death knell of all creation!
Still...still you refuse to yield!?
The natural order overturned...
...all in existence bent to my will!
Malice... Become flesh!
The great cataclysm...faithfully recreated.
From broken skies fall tears of flame...
All shall burn!
The marvels of Syrcus were but playthings...
I have no need for restraint!
This cannot be... I am a god... A god!
Now comes the end for you and all you hold dear.
Darkness rises!
Will you live to see the end?
How I've waited for this day!
My life's work...my masterpiece!
At last, I am become Zodiark!
Have you the strength of will to alter man's fate?
Crystals of Light, to me!
Hear...
The song of creation's end...
Feel...
The sorrow at hope's demise...
Think...
And find your way in the Darkness.
Follow your Light...
Or fly, my children, and never look back!
Then you are resolved...
...but this test is far from over!
The Light doth obey my command!
Succumb not to fear!
Flee. You have been found wanting.
A change of arms... May the test continue!
A change of arms... Mark well my movements!
By Crystal's Light...
And now this!
Our hunt ends this day. There is nowhere you can flee that we cannot follow.
Even stars must die.
We have seen the end.
The same end, again and again.
All of us have known despair.
A sorrow so deep only emptiness remains.
This is a kindness.
'Tis so lonely between the stars.
Battered by the husks of the dead and dying.
If there is no happiness in life...
There is only one place it may be found.
Oblivion!
Dynamis?
No matter. You only delay the inevitable.
This is fate!
Your time has come. It always does...
Light the way!
What is this defiance?
No! The hatred, the pain, the loss...
We cannot suffer it again...
What we saw... What I saw...
This can only end in misery and desolation!
No life, no star, nor the universe itself...
None should hope for better!
Embrace the quiet!
Utterly futile.
Your suffering is at an end.
We will stand against fate.
No matter the cost!
We've been here before...
Many a time.
Thus do we know...
To never give up.
For hope will shine again!
10 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
5 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
4 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
3 seconds...
2 seconds...
1 second...
Arrive at the central observatory
Clear the central observatory
Arrive at the Saltcrystal Strings
Clear the Saltcrystal Strings
Arrive at the Midnight Downwell
Defeat Amon the Undying
All seems in order with the lens... And I trust you can hear me?
Those things are pure malcontent! The residue of lives unfulfilled.
This brilliance, this warmth... It couldn't be...
You cannot take this from me! Never will I surrender my devotion...my love!
Bear my pain unto my enemy's breast, Aglaea!
Not again... Never again will I yield to you!
My...lord... Gaius!!!
As my life belonged to the Empire...in death, I shall serve!
I will fulfill my duty ere I rest. I must!
You will fall to Tartarus!
Crumble before me!
Lord van Baelsar... Again...I fail you...
Many faces have I worn, but this is my favorite by far...
You will persist in this folly no longer!
The stage is set...
Let the curtains rise for the main attraction!
My, what a boorish audience you are!
Follow the flow of aether. It will guide you!
The aether is too dense... I'm losing you!
In a rush of familiar wisdom, the memory of a principled Scion takes form.
In a rush of familiar affection, the memory of a valiant Archon takes form.
In a rush of familiar delight, the memory of a kind-hearted knight takes form.
Arrive in Trnakiya
Clear Trnakiya
Arrive in Insight
Clear Insight
Arrive in Devatagara
Clear Devatagara
My friends, heed me─ These are children of Thavnair!
Forgive me... I could do them no harm.
If this is the only way...
Screams...from the village! We must hurry!
What is this vile presence I sense?
The horde draweth near! Be on your guard!
...I shall silence the beasts of the air. Pray continue onward!
Arrive at the Frozen Sphere
Clear the Frozen Sphere
Arrive at Concept Review
Clear Concept Review
Arrive at the Celestial Sphere
Defeat Hermes
Please, turn back! Else I might be forced to...
I'm warning you. Stay away.
I cannot let you take Meteion. Not yet.
I must hear their answers before they are expunged from existence.
I will have the time and tranquility I require.
Gust and gale, gather to me!
Ancient brand, unleash your power!
Stars on high, fall as rain!
Streams of aether, surge as one!
Dancing winds, pierce my foes!
Even when transformed... But I am not finished yet!
Reach Camp Broken Glass within the time limit
Board the magitek reaper and clear a path
Disembark the magitek reaper and proceed to Camp Broken Glass
●瓦礫に伏せて隠れろ！
●仲間の待つ拠点へ急いで迎え！
Proceed while avoiding tempered imperials
Fight your way past the tempered imperials
Assist the civilians in defeating the creatures
Assist the civilians in defeating the transformed imperials
With the last of your strength, crawl to Camp Broken Glass
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
Not bad at all, given your diminished capacity!<<key>>Nevertheless, 'twould perhaps be prudent to keep to the shadows...<<key>>...Scurrying about like a rodent!
You there! Please, help us!
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
●不要になりました

What was that voice...?
They've found us─get ready!
That's it─ceruleum! Quick, let's get it back to the camp!

It's going to explode!
Get behind the armor!
Unable to escape the blast, you begin to lose consciousness...
...But your determination to save your friends drives you onward!
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
●不要になりました
●不要になりました

Time to familiarize yourself with that new body...
Might I suggest a little fight to the death?
●不要になりました
Find the magitek reaper's identification key and fuel
Speak with the wounded imperial
Activate the immobilized magitek reaper with the identification key
Search wrecked magitek reapers for fuel
Carry the ceruleum tank to the immobilized magitek reaper and refuel it
●不要になりました

Pssst! Over here!
I'm inside this building. Come quickly!
What a shame! You were too slow to keep my lord from your friends. Let the slaughter begin!
Search around the immobilized magitek reaper for the person calling to you
Arrive at Magitek Servicing
Clear Magitek Servicing
Arrive at Martial Conditioning
Clear Martial Conditioning
Arrive at the Iron Womb
Defeat Anima
My beautiful little boy will keep this tower free of vermin!
Uhhhngh!
Ouch! What are you doing, you foolish boy!? The vermin are over there!
Uhhhngh!
Gah! I'll teach you to underestimate my genius!

Wee hee hee!
Look upon the face of fear!

Lord Zenos put me in charge for a reason!
I'll have your heads for playthings!

Wee hee hee!
I'll slice you in two!

Wee hee hee!
Even the mightiest of warriors can't fight without air!
Nothing quite like good, old-fashioned explosions!
Curses! You may have bested me, but you're no match for Lord Zenos!
We'd better clear the train of threats before we arrive, or things could get nasty!
Pathetic! Do the ironmen seek to slow us with these obstructions!?
We're slowing down! Our destination must be close.
Look, captives! Help me free them!
You may leave them in our care!

A moment's reprieve...
From here onwards, we should split into three groups to divide their attention.
This is Lyse─we've unlocked the lift!
The alarum should be disabled now. With that, I believe we can use the lift!
I have smashed those noisy machines to pieces!
The ironmen's contraptions were no match for the Sun!
What could they possibly need such an enormous lift for?
Enemies!? In here!?
So our paths diverge... Then let us see who gets there first!
増援は食い止めてみせるッ！
フン……お前たちも到着したか。
Go! I shall deal with these whelps!
Anima begins feeding on souls!
A horrific roar tears at the fabric of reality!
Wails of lamentation call forth chaotic energies!
The altered reality plunges into chaos!
Arrive at Smileport
Clear Smileport
Arrive at the Welcome Wheel
Clear the Welcome Wheel
Arrive at the Frame
Defeat the Big Cheese
Intruder alert! Intruder alert! Initiating extermination protocol.
Initiating frameworker scan...
Warning: you have entered the killing zone. Please stand by for bomb detonation, and remember─safety first!
I have been authorized to eliminate all visitors with extreme prejudice. Apologies for the inconvenience.
Welcome to Smileton, intruders! Please enjoy your stay─it will be very brief.
Scan complete. Prepare for replicant synthesis.
Arrive in the playroom
Clear the playroom
Arrive at the banquet hall
Clear the banquet hall
Arrive in the ballroom
Thwart Papa Gruff's ritual
You're inside, then? Excellent! I will do all in my power to assist you in thwarting the Gruff clan's vile scheme!
Be sure to make use of the fiendish lantern I gave you should you encounter any voidsent!
Also, if you come across any lost souls, give them a good splash of holy water to guide them back to the mortal realm.
These fiends hunger for more souls. Keep your nerves calm and your wits about you!
Yay! A new friend to play with!
Welcome to my banquet, friends. Pray join me in the dining room so I can─rather, so we all can feast.
How dare you ruin our banquet!? You shall pay for this with your life─no, with your very soul!
Saved Souls
You think you can get away with stealing all my precious souls!? Never!
Oh, how hard I labored to claim those souls! You will rue the day you dared defy the House of Gruff!
Bah! Freeing a handful of souls will not affect my scheme. Before long, the Night of Devilry will be upon us!
An unexpected guest, I see. But it matters not─no meddler will stop my plan!
Oh, a new friend! Let's play together here─forever and ever and ever and ever and...
Open as many pumpkin chests as you can to win! Watch out for the ones that go boom, though! Hahaha, this'll be fun!
Wow, you're good at this game! Promise you'll play with me again, okay?
Chests Opened
Greetings, my dear friend. Pray eat your fill. We want your soul to be nice and plump when we devour it...
Dinner is served! Dig in, everyone!
You like it, then? Wonderful! Your soul is going to be oh-so-tasty now...
Mama Gruff's Mood
Meddling wretch! You'll not leave this place alive!
No doubt this is a ritual meant to usher in the Night of Devilry. You must save as many souls as you can and put a stop to it!
You're more trouble than I thought you'd be. Fine, then! I shall harvest the souls I require myself!
Is that all you've got? Come, now─at least make an effort!
That's what I'm talking about. But now it's my turn!
Why, you're the best friend I've ever had! What frightful fun this is!
Why, it seems the lantern is having the desired effect. Splendid! Perhaps you'll be safe, after all.
Please... You must save me!
I just want to go home...
Ruined! The ritual is ruined! You'll pay for your insolence...
Souls Saved
I fear we've no choice but for you to go along with this dreadful game for now...
Strangely enough, the food appears to be entirely safe. I suggest you eat your fair share and try to keep Mama Gruff in a good mood.
Splendid work! You've already saved an impressive number of souls. Keep going, and he'll have no choice but to abandon the ritual!
Meet the sixth end
Leave the sixth end behind
Meet the eighth end
Leave the eighth end behind
Meet the seventeenth end
Leave the seventeenth end behind
Those who lived and festered, those who died and decayed...
Its people sought ever greater freedoms no matter the cost...
So they created the kindest, most gentle of beasts.
Its steps were light, and its gift was as painless as it was beautiful.
Bathed in its golden glow, they all slept happily ever after...
For altruism and selfishness both were its carriers.
Once upon a time, there was a beautiful blue star...
...that fell to pestilence, and rotted inside and out.
The more its people clung to life, the more they suffered.
Until they cursed not the illness, but their fellow corrupted.
And the very last of them wished they had never been born at all.
In a faraway place, a brilliant star eradicated disease...
...before destroying the selfsame lives it had saved.
They tried to buy peace with fire and steel...
And when one asked, “What is the point?” there were none left to answer.
Farther still existed a star without strife...
...where none remembered life's trials─or its joys.
What its people had gained from ease, they lost to apathy.
Resuming peace protocol. All life-forms must be eliminated to achieve peace in perpetuity.
Deploying perpetual war machines. Please stand by for order to fire.
Vital signs detected... Initiating extinction protocol in accordance with primary directive.
Help...me...

クル、シイ…
グルジイヨォォォ
Don't...leave me...
Don't...want to...die...alone...
We'd do well to flee to higher ground, lest the creature drown us in its rage.
Defeat the hippokampos
Its head and body are at odds... Yet I doubt it signifies anything good.
Its head comes off!? Have care!
